headline: Radical Transparency: If cops have to wear bodycams, so should politicians!
description:
2022 US Senate Progressive Democrat for Washington State (Ravin Pierre) candidate running on a platform that includes “Radical Transparency” wants to make lobbyists’ lives miserable. If elected he proposes to livestream /record all interactions with lobbyists on OnlyFans and requiring himself & his Senate staffers to wear bodycams. Candidate Ravin Pierre is an Aerospace Engineer & Data Scientist.

https://mobile.twitter.com/majorityfm/status/1515356488491061258 - short clip: (00:10 mins)

Full video: Radical Transparency (01:46 mins) https://vm.tiktok.com/TTPdkPaXHk/
